title: Change of program output offsets breaks compatibility with old programs
content:
## Description

The structure of data and offsets in the program output was changed. A new field for data availability mode was added in offset 1, shifting the old fields one position in the output structure. This makes old program outputs incompatible with the new version, as the old outputâ€™s `N_ASSET_CONFIGS` is now interpreted as `DATA_AVAILABILITY_MODE`, and the minimum size is increased to nine fields.

## Recommendations

## Short term
Ensure that when contracts are upgraded, operators send the correct version of the program outputs to update the state.

## Long term
When changing data structures, consider making the changes backward compatible with the current version by adding new data fields to the end of the structure instead of shifting existing fields.
